vclaim: Derek Chauvin, convicted of the murder of George Floyd, was a police training officer. Kim Potter, charged with second-degree manslaughter of Daunte Wright, was also a police training officer and president of her police union.
title: Were Both Derek Chauvin and Kim Potter Police Training Officers?
subtitle: Chauvin was convicted of murdering George Floyd, while Potter was charged with second-degree manslaughter of Daunte Wright.
author: Nur Ibrahim
